languages.text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы задерживается на безучастно стоящей Ирлиэт.{/n} "Ксеносу дозволено обитать в ковчеге Домин наравне с людьми? Черное сердце врага Человечества не способно оценить такой милости, и никакое притворство не сокроет от слуги Неумирающего богохульную суть нелюдя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы задерживается на безучастно стоящей Ирлиэт.{/n} "Ксеносу дозволено обитать в ковчеге Домин наравне с людьми? Черное сердце врага Человечества не способно оценить такой милости, и никакое притворство не сокроет от слуги Неумирающего богохульную суть нелюдя".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы задерживается на безучастно стоящей Ирлиэт.{/n} "Ксеносу дозволено обитать в ковчеге Домин наравне с людьми? Черное сердце врага Человечества не способно оценить такой милости, и никакое притворство не сокроет от слуги Неумирающего богохульную суть нелюдя".

The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

{n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah fija su mirada en Yrliet, que se la devuelve con indiferencia.{/n} «¿La xenos tiene dispensa para morar en el arca {mf|del|de la} Domin en igualdad de condiciones que los humanos? El negro corazón de los enemigos de la Humanidad no sabe apreciar tal privilegio, y por más que disimule no puede ocultar su naturaleza blasfema e inhumana de una sierva del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah fija su mirada en Yrliet, que se la devuelve con indiferencia.{/n} «¿La xenos tiene dispensa para morar en el arca {mf|del|de la} Domin en igualdad de condiciones que los humanos? El negro corazón de los enemigos de la Humanidad no sabe apreciar tal privilegio, y por más que disimule no puede ocultar su naturaleza blasfema e inhumana de una sierva del Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}キベラの視線がユリエットに注がれると、無表情で見つめた。{/n}「異種族はドミンの箱舟に人間と対等に住むことを許されるのでしょうか？人類の黒い心の敵は、そのような好意に感謝することはできません。不死の者の僕から非人間的な本性を隠すことはできないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの視線がユリエットに注がれると、無表情で見つめた。{/n}「異種族はドミンの箱舟に人間と対等に住むことを許されるのでしょうか？人類の黒い心の敵は、そのような好意に感謝することはできません。不死の者の僕から非人間的な本性を隠すことはできないのです」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的目光盯着伊莉耶特，而伊莉耶特面无表情地回视着。{/n}“这个异形竟然居住在秘者的方舟之中，与人类享受平等的地位？邪恶的人类之敌不配得到这样的恩赐。无论他们怎么掩饰，都无法在不死之神的忠仆面前掩饰非人之物的亵渎本性。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的目光盯着伊莉耶特，而伊莉耶特面无表情地回视着。{/n}“这个异形竟然居住在秘者的方舟之中，与人类享受平等的地位？邪恶的人类之敌不配得到这样的恩赐。无论他们怎么掩饰，都无法在不死之神的忠仆面前掩饰非人之物的亵渎本性。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Blick ruht auf Yrliet, die keine Regung zeigt.{/n} "Der Xenos darf in der Arche {mf|des Domin|der Domin} auf Augenhöhe mit Menschen leben? Das schwarze Herz des Feindes der Menschheit weiß eine solche Gefälligkeit nicht zu schätzen, und keine Heuchelei kann das blasphemische Wesen des Unholdes vor einer Dienerin des Todlosen verbergen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Blick ruht auf Yrliet, die keine Regung zeigt.{/n} "Der Xenos darf in der Arche {mf|des Domin|der Domin} auf Augenhöhe mit Menschen leben? Das schwarze Herz des Feindes der Menschheit weiß eine solche Gefälligkeit nicht zu schätzen, und keine Heuchelei kann das blasphemische Wesen des Unholdes vor einer Dienerin des Todlosen verbergen."

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Kibellah s'attarde sur Yrliet, qui se contente de rester impassible.{/n} « La xénos est autorisée à rester aux côtés {mf|du|de la} Domin, au même titre que les humains ? Le cœur corrompu des ennemis de l'Humanité ne peut apprécier une telle faveur à sa juste valeur, et rien ne pourra jamais masquer la nature blasphématoire de l'inhumaine aux yeux des véritables serviteurs de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Kibellah s'attarde sur Yrliet, qui se contente de rester impassible.{/n} « La xénos est autorisée à rester aux côtés {mf|du|de la} Domin, au même titre que les humains ? Le cœur corrompu des ennemis de l'Humanité ne peut apprécier une telle faveur à sa juste valeur, et rien ne pourra jamais masquer la nature blasphématoire de l'inhumaine aux yeux des véritables serviteurs de l'Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın bakışları, olan biteni sakince izleyen Yrliet'in üzerinde geziniyor.{/n} "Bu zenonun Domin'in arkında insanlarla eşit koşullarda yaşamasına izin veriliyor mu? İnsanlığın düşmanının kara yüreği, böylesi bir nezaketi kavraya yetisine sahip değil. Hiçbir aldatmaca da insan dışının dine aykırı tabiatını Ölmeyen'in hizmetkârından gizleyemez."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's gaze lingers on Yrliet, who looks on impassively.{/n} "The xenos is permitted to dwell in the Domin's ark on equal footing with humans? The enemy of Humanity's black heart cannot appreciate such favour, and no dissembling can hide the inhuman's blasphemous nature from the servant of the Undying One."
